meanings.definition: A person who sits on a bench.
meanings.sent1: The park was full of benchers enjoying the sunshine.
meanings.sent2: The benchers in the waiting room chatted quietly.
meanings.sent3: The benchers had a race to see who could sit the longest without moving.
meanings.sent4: The benchers in the courtroom held the power of judgment.
meanings.sent5: The benchers watched the world go by from their favorite spot.

meanings.definition: A group of people sitting on a bench.
meanings.sent1: The benchers on the park bench shared snacks and stories.
meanings.sent2: The benchers at the bus stop waited patiently for their ride.
meanings.sent3: The benchers on the bench cheered loudly for their team.
meanings.sent4: The benchers formed a united front against the pigeons.
meanings.sent5: The benchers on the bench greeted each passerby with a smile.

meanings.definition: A device used for sitting on.
meanings.sent1: The wooden benchers in the garden provided a peaceful resting spot.
meanings.sent2: The metal benchers in the park were sturdy and comfortable.
meanings.sent3: The benchers in the classroom were always in high demand during group work.
meanings.sent4: The benchers in the locker room held the weight of tired athletes.
meanings.sent5: The cozy benchers by the fireplace were perfect for reading a book.
